alert.note: Alert for Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 28 at 11:41PM PST until January 29 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Oregon, Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon. In Washington, Yakima Valley, Lower Columbia Basin of Washington and Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington. * WHEN...Until noon PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL Freezing fog may be present in locations where temperatures drop below freezing, which may cause slick roadways and other surfaces.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
